lom:description.lom:string: Advanced version of interactive logic programs, covering truth tables, propositional connectives, Propositional Connectives Davis-Putnam procedure Parse Terms and Atomic Formulas Unification algorithm Find the Critical Pairs Knuth-Bendix Term Orderings.

lom:keyword.lom:string: mathematical logic, artificial intelligence, discrete mathematics

lom:title.lom:string: Advanced Version of Interactive Logic Programs
